feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add membership creation date to Organization Member List table (CAL-5406) by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20595
  • fix: Offset is required but not passed everywhere, default to zero. by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20917
  • fix: exclude email from replyTo by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20953
  • fix: Added orderBy in the correct place by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20959
  • fix: double end-date parsing when saving availability by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20963
  • fix: Don't delete Cal video room upon requesting reschedule by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20969
  • chore: leverage app router error.tsx page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20955
  • chore: better code - migrate getServerSideProps file directly to RSC for /apps by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20926
  • fix: dont persist last booking response, temporarily by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20975
  • perf: Improve performance of period limits by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20974
  • revert: "feat: add membership creation date to Organization Member List table (CAL-5406) by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20978
  • perf: Add credentialId index to selectedCalendar by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20979
  • refactor: team feature flags now traverse up to the organization by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20980

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.6...v5.2.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Handle acme.cal.local root path by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20981
  • fix: broken attendee sms by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20985
  • fix: Do not retrieve already persisted lastBookingResponse by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20982
  • perf: Remove data fetching in metadata for non-booking pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20734
  • fix: Remove 30 seats minimum text from organization setup page by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20983
  • fix: few event details not populated in hubspot by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20987
  • fix: cancel platform subscription on dashboard by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20787
  • feat: added hideOrganizerEmail to api/v2/event-types by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21005
  • fix: Skip already completed org onboarding, as webhook request can come when invoice is paid again next month by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20984
  • fix: text encoding bug by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17923
  • fix: unable to create meeting with ms teams by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20993
  • fix: encoding bug by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21004
  • perf: SSR - /event-types and /event-types/[type] by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20952
  • fix: schedule unscheduled emails with tasker in cron job by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20748
  • fix: hide organizer email in cal video sidebar by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21011
  • refactor: Use Salesforce GraphQL for account ownership routing by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20655
  • fix: Handle calendar-cache with Delegation Credentials by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18619
  • fix: UI Bug - ToggleGroup by @ronitrajfr in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20997
  • feat: /skip trial for teams by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20753
  • fix: cleanup html reports when pr is merged/closed by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20089
  • chore: format calendar events to remove oauthClientIds by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21040
  • fix: meeting link fails when host requests to reschedule by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20999
  • fix: cal.cache not working by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21044
  • fix: restricting platform user from creating another regular org by @romitg2 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20929
  • feat: Ability to set a locked timezone for event type by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20425
  • fix: dry run props for CalendarSettings atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20818
  • fix: unit test bug by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21046
  • fix: attendeePhoneNumber not appearing in calendar event by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21035
  • feat: routing v3 design by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20607
  • chore: fixed headline of timelessui by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21051
  • chore: Allow Foundation to approve on behalf of Consumer by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21057
  • feat: show-utm-params by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20733
  • revert: "fix: eventType filter on /insights (#20823)" by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21059
  • feat: add setting to disable phone only sms notification by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21038
  • revert: "feat: Ability to set a locked timezone for event type (#20425)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21066

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.7...v5.2.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: Replace attendee email with user id in idempotency key by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21058
  • fix: disabled sms hanging, by calling resolve() by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21070
  • fix: rf v3 tidy up mobile issues by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21078
  • fix: between operator for attribute matching by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21031
  • feat: verified resources endpoint [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21006
  • fix: wrong info on cancelled email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21085
  • fix: return for dry run by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21088
  • test: retry times for api v2 e2e test in CI by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21087
  • fix: Read user id properly when generating idempotency key by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21092
  • chore: bump platform libraries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21101
  • fix: add missing 'add' in profile username tip (#21049) by @shashwat558 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21097
  • fix: typos in apps/api/v2 by @luzpaz in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21105
  • feat: add membership creation date to Organization Member List table (CAL-5406) by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21008
  • fix: correct booker email input by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21077
  • fix: button fixes v3 by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20557
  • fix: meeting link fails when manually reassign by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21106
  • fix: {Organizer} placeholder in event title not updating on reschedule by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21034
  • build(packages/features): resolved type error when building apps/web. by @zhyd1997 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21094
  • feat: booking URL validation to accept links without explicit mention of https:// by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21110
  • fix: availability view error by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21115
  • fix: add back round robin data to insights/router-position by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21116
  • chore: Update CODEOWNERS for booking tRPC handlers by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21118
  • perf: remove unnecessary routes from middleware by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21089
  • chore: Add proton.me to email provider list by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21117

New Contributors

  • @shashwat558 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21097
  • @zhyd1997 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21094

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.8...v5.2.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: centralize feature flag operations in FeaturesRepository by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21032
  • chore: get bookings with kysely by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21084
  • fix: theme search param crashing booking page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21120

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.9...v5.2.10

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.2.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Salesforce Event Type App v3 designs by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21100
  • fix: get bookings advanced email and attendee filter by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21125
  • docs: Update delegation-credential.md by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21124
  • fix: improvements for scheduling Email reminders by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/21129

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.2.10...v5.2.11
